text: spicy tender sweet and sour calamari or
sweet stir-fried with calfoon and
crunchy vegetables this is one of the
most common ways that the vietnamese
enjoy squid if you want to know how it
tastes like and how to prepare it join
me in this video and i will show you how
let's begin
you will need one large calamari about
500 grams fish sauce sriracha stock
powder salt and pepper you also need
some hot chili paste some ketchup egg
white garlic and shallot a quarter of a
pineapple one onion half a yellow bell
pepper one large tomato and some celery
remove the inners of the calamari cut it
open and use a shaft knife to make
crisscross buttons on the underside of
the calamari by scoring the surface
diagonally then cut into squares of
equal length in a bowl mix together a
tablespoon of chateton or vietnamese
shrimp chili paste a tablespoon of chili
sauce a tablespoon of ketchup a pinch of
pepper salt and stock powder a
tablespoon of fish sauce and a
tablespoon of egg white which will
prevent the squid from releasing too
much liquid when cooked mix well and
leave to sit for 15 minutes
cut the bell pepper tomato and onion
into the sides of the squid
cut the pineapple into slices cut celery
and green onion into shorter lengths
in a pan saute some minced garlic until
frequent then add the squid and toss
well over high heat for about 2 minutes
transfer to a plate then add the pie
apple stir and cook for a minute so the
pie apple will release the sourness then
add the vegetables cook for a couple
minutes then add the celery and green
onion return the squid to the pan and
toss well transfer to serve on a plate
add some freshly cracked pepper and it
will goes perfectly with some hot
steamed rice it's a colorful nutritious
and most importantly super delish dish
make sure you give it a try and let me
know what you think share with me a
photo if you do on social media with
hashtag helen recipes i'm so looking
forward to them i will see you then next
time bye
[Music]
you
